person.persName: Richard A. Martin (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Catherine Martin. Father of John W. Martin, Elisha H. Martin, Mary E. Martin, James J. Martin, and Laura J. Martin. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.
